name: GetProjectTemplateDetails
description:
Retrieve complete details of a specific Asana project template.

Fetches all information about a particular project template in Asana. Useful for obtaining full details of a project's structure and specifications.

parameters.name: project_template_id
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the project template to fetch complete details.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the project template.

parameters.name: include_optional_properties
parameters.description: List properties to include in the response. Exclude default properties, using a comma-separated format.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: pretty_output_enabled
parameters.description: Set to true to receive a formatted and readable response output, suitable for debugging. Increases response time and size.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.description:

Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

value_schema.description:

parameters.name: opt_fields
parameters.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

value_schema.description: This endpoint returns a resource which excludes some properties by default. To include those optional properties, set this query parameter to a comma-separated list of the properties you wish to include.

parameters.name: project_template_gid
parameters.description: Globally unique identifier for the project template.

value_schema.description: Globally unique identifier for the project template.
